entity.name: Melania Trump
entity.description: Former US First Lady Melania Trump

text: @FLOTUS Honourable Melania Trump, Your Thought And Prayers Which Will Continue For Each Person Suffering & Fighting To Recover From Terrible # COVID-19 & With All Families Who Have Lost Loved Ones Is Highly Appreciated. May God Showers His Blessing On You, On Your Family & Your Country.
